name: Adaptability
description: If foe initiates combat, unit counters with the best weapon available.

name: Adaptability+
description: Enhanced version: If foe initiates combat, unit counters with the best weapon available.

name: Adaptable
description: Adapts to combat situations with increased flexibility.

name: Admiration
description: If two female allies are adjacent within 2 spaces, this unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

name: Advance
description: Use to move 1 space toward a foe that is 2 spaces away and attack.

name: Air Raid
description: If unit initiates combat from a space a foe cannot enter, grants Spd+5 during combat.

name: Alabaster Duty
description: If unit is adjacent to the Divine Dragon, grants Crit+5 during combat to both of them.

name: Alacrity
description: If unit initiates combat with a Spd advantage of 9 or more, unit’s follow-up (if possible) occurs before foe can counterattack.

name: Alacrity+
description: If unit initiates combat with a Spd advantage of 7 or more, unit’s follow-up (if possible) occurs before foe can counterattack.

name: Alacrity++
description: If unit initiates combat with a Spd advantage of 5 or more, unit’s follow-up (if possible) occurs before foe can counterattack.

name: All for One
description: Use to make a sword attack against an adjacent foe. All allies within 2 spaces chain attack.

name: Allied Defense
description: If unit is between an ally and a foe, reduces damage to unit by 3 during combat with that foe.

name: Anima Focus
description: When using tomes, unit inflicts Def-3 with fire, Hit-20 with thunder, or Mov-2 with wind magic for 1 turn.

name: Arms Shield
description: When unit has weapon advantage, unit takes 3 less damage.

name: Arms Shield+
description: When unit has weapon advantage, unit takes 5 less damage.

name: Arms Shield++
description: When unit has weapon advantage, unit takes 7 less damage.

name: Art Focus 1
description: Grants Hit+10 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using an art.

name: Art Focus 2
description: Grants Hit+15 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using an art.

name: Art Focus 3
description: Grants Hit+20 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using an art.

name: Art Focus 4
description: Grants Hit+25 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using an art.

name: Art Focus 5
description: Grants Hit+30 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using an art.

name: Aspiring Hero
description: If no other units are within 1 space of unit or foe, grants Hit+20 at a cost of Avo-10 during combat.

name: Assign Decoy
description: Use to make one chosen ally more likely to be targeted by enemies for 1 turn.

name: Astra Storm
description: Use to launch 5 bow attacks at 30% damage, up to range 10.

name: Attuned
description: If unit initiates combat and defeats foe, grants engage partner +4 to all seven basic stats while engaged.

name: Augment
description: Grants staff range +5 and area of effect +1.

name: Avoid +10
description: Grants Avo+10.

name: Avoid +15
description: Grants Avo+15.

name: Avoid +20
description: Grants Avo+20.

name: Avoid +25
description: Grants Avo+25.

name: Avoid +30
description: Grants Avo+30.

name: Axe Guard 1
description: If foe is equipped with an axe, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

name: Axe Guard 2
description: If foe is equipped with an axe, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

name: Axe Guard 3
description: If foe is equipped with an axe, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

name: Axe Guard 4
description: If foe is equipped with an axe, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

name: Axe Guard 5
description: If foe is equipped with an axe, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

name: Axe Power 1
description: Grants Atk+2 at a cost of Avo-10 when using an axe.

name: Axe Power 2
description: Grants Atk+4 at a cost of Avo-10 when using an axe.

name: Axe Power 3
description: Grants Atk+6 at a cost of Avo-10 when using an axe.

name: Axe Power 4
description: Grants Atk+8 at a cost of Avo-10 when using an axe.

name: Axe Power 5
description: Grants Atk+10 at a cost of Avo-10 when using an axe.

name: Back at You
description: When countering, unit may deal extra damage = half of damage taken.

name: Big Personality
description: When unit uses a healing staff, grants range +1.

name: Blazing Lion
description: Use to attack adjacent foe and an area 3 spaces wide. Target area and the 2 rows beyond it are set on fire.

name: Blinding Flash
description: If unit initiates combat, inflicts Avo-10 on foe during combat.

name: Block Recovery
description: When attacking a broken foe with a tome, grants a chance the foe will remain broken.

name: Blood Fury
description: If unit's HP is not at max after combat, grants Crit+10 as long as unit's HP stays below max.

name: Blue Skies
description: Unit takes 3 less damage and deals +3 damage.

name: Blue Skies+
description: Unit takes 5 less damage and deals +5 damage.

name: Bond Blast
description: Use to make a sword attack from the unit and engage partner followed by a magic beam attack against an adjacent foe.

name: Bond Forger
description: Grants Hit/Avo+20 to unit and allies within 2 spaces that are synced or engaged with an Emblem.

name: Bond Forger+
description: Grants Hit/Avo+30 to unit and allies within 2 spaces that are synced or engaged with an Emblem.

name: Bonded Shield
description:
Use to prevent first attacks on adjacent allies until your next turn. Trigger %=80.
[Dragon] +10% to trigger rate.
[Cavalry] Trigger %=100 for cavalry allies.
[Armored] Trigger %=100 for armored allies.
[Flying] Trigger %=100 for flying allies.
[Qi Adept] Trigger %=100.

name: Book of Worlds
description: Book of Worlds advances 1 stage (to max 5) for each consecutive round that unit uses Wait. Reverts to base stage if unit triggers the effect.

name: Book of Worlds 1
description: If unit initiates combat, freezes foe after combat.

name: Book of Worlds 2
description: If unit initiates combat, freezes foe and sets foe’s space on fire after combat.

name: Book of Worlds 3
description: If unit initiates combat, deals 10 damage, freezes foe, and sets foe’s space on fire after combat.

name: Book of Worlds 4
description: If unit initiates combat, restores HP equal to damage dealt during combat, then deals 10 damage, freezes foe, and sets foe’s space on fire after combat.

name: Book of Worlds 5
description: If unit initiates combat, restores HP to self and adjacent allies equal to damage dealt during combat, then deals 10 damage, freezes foe, and sets foe’s space on fire after combat.

name: Boon of Elyos
description: If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to Crit and Ddg equal to 2× the number of allies who have acted this turn.

name: Bow Agility 1
description: Grants Avo+10 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a bow.

name: Bow Agility 2
description: Grants Avo+15 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a bow.

name: Bow Agility 3
description: Grants Avo+20 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a bow.

name: Bow Agility 4
description: Grants Avo+25 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a bow.

name: Bow Agility 5
description: Grants Avo+30 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a bow.

name: Bow Focus 1
description: Grants Hit+10 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a bow.

name: Bow Focus 2
description: Grants Hit+15 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a bow.

name: Bow Focus 3
description: Grants Hit+20 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a bow.

name: Bow Focus 4
description: Grants Hit+25 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a bow.

name: Bow Focus 5
description: Grants Hit+30 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a bow.

name: Bow Guard 1
description: If foe is equipped with a bow, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

name: Bow Guard 2
description: If foe is equipped with a bow, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

name: Bow Guard 3
description: If foe is equipped with a bow, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

name: Bow Guard 4
description: If foe is equipped with a bow, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

name: Bow Guard 5
description: If foe is equipped with a bow, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

name: Brave Assist
description: If unit’s HP is at max while unit makes a chain attack, unit attacks twice.

name: Bravery
description: Unit deals +3 damage.

name: Bravery+
description: Unit deals +5 damage.

name: Break Defenses
description: If unit’s attack breaks foe, unit makes an extra attack at 50% damage.

name: Brute Force
description: While making a physical attack, critical hits deal increased damage. [Damage increased by one third.]

name: Build 1
description: Grants Bld+3.

name: Build 2
description: Grants Bld+4.

name: Build 3
description: Grants Bld+5.

name: Call Doubles
description: Creates four illusory doubles that can make chain attacks with unit.

name: Canter
description: Unit can move 2 spaces after acting.

name: Canter+
description: Unit can move 3 spaces after acting.

name: Careful Aim
description: If unit initiates combat without moving first, grants Hit+40 during combat.

name: Cataclysm
description:
Use to attack foes in an area with fire, thunder and wind magic at 40% damage. Wind is effective: Flying.
[Dragon] Sets terrain on fire.
[Mystical] +10% damage.
[Qi Adept] 20% chance of breaking target.

name: Cataclysm+
description:
Use to attack foes in an area with fire, thunder and wind magic at 40% damage. Wind is effective: Flying.
[Dragon] Sets terrain on fire.
[Mystical] +10% damage.
[Qi Adept] 20% chance of breaking target.

name: Chaos Style
description: If unit initiates combat with a physical attack against a foe armed with magic or vice versa, grants Spd+3 during combat.

name: Charm
description: If unit's attack triggers a chain attack, increases chain attack accuracy to 90%.

name: Charmer
description: During combat with a foe who was also unit's most recent opponent, inflicts Crit-10 on that foe.

name: Clear the Way
description: Unit's space and adjacent spaces have a movement cost of 1 for allies.

name: Cleric
description: Unit can equip staves up to level C.

name: Cleric+
description: Unit can equip staves up to level B.

name: Cleric++
description: Unit can equip staves up to level A.

name: Combat Arts
description: Enables use of Edelgard, Dimitri, or Claude's Combat Art. Spends some remaining engage turns.

name: Contemplative
description: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, grants Def+2 for 1 turn.

name: Contract
description: Use to grant another action to an adjacent ally who has already acted.

name: Convoy
description: Use to deposit or retrieve weapons and items.

name: Crimson Cheer
description: If unit is adjacent to the Divine Dragon, grants Avo+10 during combat to both of them.

name: Curious Dance
description: At start of turn, allies within 2 spaces of unit recover 10% of their max HP.

name: Dark Inferno
description:
Use to deal damage to foes on certain spaces near unit and set those spaces on fire.
[Dragon] Increases area of effect.
[Mystical] +20% damage.
[Qi Adept] Adds Glow to adjacent spaces.

name: Dark Inferno+
description:
Use to deal damage to foes on certain spaces near unit and set those spaces on fire.
[Dragon] Increases area of effect.
[Mystical] +20% damage.
[Qi Adept] Adds Glow to adjacent spaces.

name: Decisive Strike
description: If unit initiates combat and lands a critical, deals 5 damage to foe after combat.

name: Decisive Strike+
description: If unit initiates combat and lands a critical, deals 10 damage to foe after combat.

name: Defense 1
description: Grants Def+1.

name: Defense 2
description: Grants Def+2.

name: Defense 3
description: Grants Def+3.

name: Defense 4
description: Grants Def+4.

name: Defense 5
description: Grants Def+5.

name: Demolish
description: Break destructible terrain in a single blow when using Destroy.

name: Detoxify
description: Cures poison at start of turn.

name: Dexterity 1
description: Grants Dex+1.

name: Dexterity 2
description: Grants Dex+2.

name: Dexterity 3
description: Grants Dex+3.

name: Dexterity 4
description: Grants Dex+4.

name: Dexterity 5
description: Grants Dex+5.

name: Diffuse Healer
description: When unit is healed by a staff, all adjacent allies also recover 50% of the HP that the unit recovered.

name: Disarming Sigh
description: If foe is male, inflicts Hit-20 on that foe during combat.

name: Divine Pulse
description: May turn a missed attack into a hit. Trigger %=30. Chance increases with high Lck.

name: Divine Pulse+
description: May turn a missed attack into a hit. Trigger %=50. Chance increases with high Lck.

name: Divine Speed
description:
Unit performs an extra attack at 50% damage in combat.
[Covert] If extra attack hits, poisons foe.
[Dragon] Unit recovers HP equal to damage dealt by extra attack.

name: Divine Spirit
description: Unit's engage meter is shortened one step.

name: Divinely Inspiring
description: Adjacent allies deal +3 damage and take 1 less damage.

name: Dodge +10
description: Grants Ddg+10.

name: Dodge +15
description: Grants Ddg+15.

name: Dodge +20
description: Grants Ddg+20.

name: Dodge +25
description: Grants Ddg+25.

name: Dodge +30
description: Grants Ddg+30.

name: Draconic Form
description: Unit transforms into and fights as a dragon while engaged. Grants +10 to max HP and +5 to Bld and all basic stats.

name: Draconic Hex
description: If unit initiates combat, inflicts -4 to all of foe's basic stats after combat.

name: Dragon Blast
description: Use to make two attacks against an adjacent foe with a sword and powerful magic beam.

name: Dragon Vein
description:
Use to add a special effect to certain spaces.
[Dragon] Choose any Vein effect.
[Backup] Creates stone pillars that increase Def/Res.
[Cavalry] Creates water that decreases Avo.
[Covert] Creates fog that increases Avo.
[Armored] Creates vines that grant immunity to break.
[Flying] Creates healing glow that restores HP.
[Mystical] Creates flames that inflict damage.
[Qi Adept] Creates ice pillars that hinder movement.

name: Dragon Vein EX
description:
Use to add a special effect to certain spaces.
[Dragon] Choose any Vein effect.
[Backup] Creates stone pillars that increase Def/Res.
[Cavalry] Creates water that decreases Avo.
[Covert] Creates smoke that decreases Def/Avo.
[Armored] Creates vines that grant immunity to break.
[Flying] Creates healing glow that restores HP.
[Mystical] Creates flames that inflict damage.
[Qi Adept] Creates ice floor that increases movement.

name: Dreadful Aura
description: If unit initiates combat, target foe and all foes within 1 space of it cannot move for 1 turn after combat.

name: Dual Assist
description: If unit is able to chain attack, unit will do so when allies attack foes unit could reach by moving. Trigger %=35.

name: Dual Assist+
description: If unit is able to chain attack, unit will do so when allies attack foes unit could reach by moving. Trigger %=70.

name: Dual Strike
description: Unit participates in chain attacks as if it were a backup unit.

name: Dual Support
description: Grants a bonus to Avo that increases with unit's support level with adjacent allies.

name: Echo
description: Use to attack with magic at 50% damage. Use a second time to launch another 50% attack.

name: Eclipse Brace
description: If unit initiates combat, unit deals extra damage=20% of foe’s Def with physical attacks and recovers HP=30% of damage dealt.

name: Eclipse Brace+
description: If unit initiates combat, unit deals extra damage=30% of foe’s Def with physical attacks and recovers HP=50% of damage dealt.

name: Enchant
description: Enables enchanting of weapons and items with special effects.

name: Energized
description: When unit recovers HP using an item, grants Str+2 for 1 turn.

name: Expertise
description: Grants unit enhanced stat growth when leveling up.

name: Fair Fight
description: If unit initiates combat, grants Hit+15 to unit and foe if foe is able to counterattack.

name: Fairy-Tale Folk
description: If a male and a female ally are adjacent within 2 spaces, unit deals +2 damage during combat.

name: Favorite Food
description: When unit eats a packed lunch, its engage meter is maxed out.

name: Fell Protection
description: Adjacent allies deal +1 damage and take 3 less damage.

name: Fell Spirit
description: At the start of each turn, unit's engage meter is filled by 1.

name: Flare
description: When attacking with tomes, inflicts Res-20% on foe, and unit recovers 50% of damage dealt.

name: Friendly Rivalry
description: At start of player phase, the Emblem will randomly switch to Edelgard, Dimitri, or Claude.

name: Friendly Boost
description: When unit defeats a foe, grants Hit+20 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.

name: Gallop
description: Grants Mov+5.

name: Gambit
description: Effects change based on synced Emblem.

name: Generosity
description: When this unit uses a healing item, adjacent allies also recover the same amount of HP.

name: Gentility
description: Unit takes 3 less damage.

name: Gentility+
description: Unit takes 5 less damage.

name: Gentle Flower
description: Recovery items used by allies within 2 spaces heal +50% HP.

name: Geosphere
description: At start of player phase, if there are allies adjacent to unit, grants Def/Res+3 to unit and those allies for 1 turn.

name: Geosphere+
description: At start of player phase, if there are allies adjacent to unit, grants Def/Res+5 to unit and those allies for 1 turn.

name: Get Behind Me
description: When an ally within 2 spaces is attacked, grants Str+3 to unit for 1 turn.

name: Giga Levin Sword
description:
Sword	Use to attack with a magic sword. Magic attack that uses physical attack power. Swords only.
[Dragon] Deals extra damage = half of Str.
[Flying] Deals extra damage = Bld.
[Mystical] Deals extra damage = half of Mag.

name: Giga Levin Sword+
description:
Use to attack with a magic sword. Magic attack that uses physical attack power. Swords only. Adjacent allies chain attack.
[Dragon] Deals extra damage = half of Str.
[Flying] Deals extra damage = Bld.
[Mystical] Deals extra damage = half of Mag.

name: Goddess Dance
description: Use to grant another action to all adjacent allies.

name: Golden Lotus
description: During combat, may prevent 50% of physical damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.

name: Grasping Void
description: When attacking with a tome, unit may deal extra damage = half of foe's Mag. Trigger %=Dex.

name: Great Aether
description: Use to grant Def/Res+5, but unit can't counter for 1 turn. Next turn, attack a 2-space area, heal HP=30% of damage dealt.

name: Great Sacrifice
description: Use to restore full HP to all allies, even those not under the player's control. After use, unit's HP=1.

name: Groundswell
description: After unit acts or waits in flames, miasma, or similar terrain effect, unit clears effect and recovers 10 HP.

name: Headlong Rush
description: Grants immunity to freeze.

name: Healing Light
description: When unit heals an ally with a staff, unit also recovers HP=50% of the amount healed.

name: Heavy Attack
description: When making a physical attack, if an equipped weapon's Wt exceeds unit's Bld, adds excess as damage.

name: Hero Summon
description: Use to summon a random unit.

name: Hit +10
description: Grants Hit+10.

name: Hit +15
description: Grants Hit+15.

name: Hit +20
description: Grants Hit+20.

name: Hit +25
description: Grants Hit+25.

name: Hit +30
description: Grants Hit+30.

name: Hobble
description: If unit initiates combat with a knife, inflicts Mov-2 on foe for 1 turn.

name: Hold Out
description: If unit had 30% HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.

name: Hold Out+
description: If unit had 20% HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.

name: Hold Out++
description: If unit had 10% HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.

name: Hold Out+++
description: If unit had 2 HP or more at start of combat, unit always survives combat with at least 1 HP.

name: Holy Aura
description: Unit is Effective: Fell Dragon. Allies within 2 spaces with Effective: Dragon gain Effective: Fell Dragon.

name: Holy Shield
description: Neutralizes Effective against this unit.

name: Holy Stance
description: If a Corrupted attacks unit, deals 10% of damage taken back to foe.

name: Holy Stance+
description: If a Corrupted attacks unit, deals 30% of damage taken back to foe.

name: Holy Stance++
description: If a Corrupted attacks unit, deals 50% of damage taken back to foe.

name: Houses Unite
description:
Use to attack with Aymr, Areadbhar, and Failnaught at 50% damage.
[Dragon] +10% damage.
[Cavalry] +10% damage with Areadbhar.
[Covert] +10% damage with Failnaught.
[Armored] +10% damage with Aymr.
[Qi Adept] Breaks foe.

name: Houses Unite+
description:
Use to attack with Aymr, Areadbhar, and Failnaught at 50% damage. After combat, take another action.
[Dragon] +10% damage.
[Cavalry] +10% damage with Areadbhar.
[Covert] +10% damage with Failnaught.
[Armored] +10% damage with Aymr.
[Qi Adept] Breaks foe.

name: HP +10
description: Grants HP+10.

name: HP +12
description: Grants HP+12.

name: HP +15
description: Grants HP+15.

name: HP +5
description: Grants HP+5.

name: HP +7
description: Grants HP+7.

name: HP Lck +10
description: Grants HP+10 and Lck+10.

name: HP Lck +2
description: Grants HP+2 and Lck+2.

name: HP Lck +4
description: Grants HP+4 and Lck+4.

name: HP Lck +6
description: Grants HP+6 and Lck+6.

name: HP Lck +8
description: Grants HP+8 and Lck+8.

name: Ignis
description: During combat, may add half of Str to magic damage or half of Mag to all other damage. Trigger %=Dex.

name: Impenetrable
description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+30% during combat.

name: Instruct
description: Use to grant allies within 2 spaces a stat bonus based on user's type. Bonus lasts for 1 turn.

name: Keen Insight
description: When unit deals Effective damage, deal +5 damage.

name: Keen Insight+
description: When unit deals Effective damage, deal +7 damage.

name: Knife Guard 1
description: If foe is equipped with a knife, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

name: Knife Guard 2
description: If foe is equipped with a knife, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

name: Knife Guard 3
description: If foe is equipped with a knife, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

name: Knife Guard 4
description: If foe is equipped with a knife, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

name: Knife Guard 5
description: If foe is equipped with a knife, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

name: Knife Precision 1
description: Grants Hit/Avo+3 when using a knife.

name: Knife Precision 2
description: Grants Hit/Avo+5 when using a knife.

name: Knife Precision 3
description: Grants Hit/Avo+7 when using a knife.

name: Knife Precision 4
description: Grants Hit/Avo+10 when using a knife.

name: Knife Precision 5
description: Grants Hit/Avo+15 when using a knife.

name: Knightly Escort
description: When 2 or more female allies are within 2 spaces, grants Hit/Avo+5 to unit and those allies.

name: Knightly Code
description: If foe initiates combat and unit is adjacent to an ally, unit takes 2 less damage.

name: Laguz Friend
description: Unit takes 50% less damage, but sets unit's Avo to 0.

name: Lance Agility 1
description: Grants Avo+10 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a lance.

name: Lance Agility 2
description: Grants Avo+15 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a lance.

name: Lance Agility 3
description: Grants Avo+20 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a lance.

name: Lance Agility 4
description: Grants Avo+25 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a lance.

name: Lance Agility 5
description: Grants Avo+30 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a lance.

name: Lance Guard 1
description: If foe is equipped with a lance, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

name: Lance Guard 2
description: If foe is equipped with a lance, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

name: Lance Guard 3
description: If foe is equipped with a lance, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

name: Lance Guard 4
description: If foe is equipped with a lance, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

name: Lance Guard 5
description: If foe is equipped with a lance, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

name: Lance Power 1
description: Grants Atk+2 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a lance.

name: Lance Power 2
description: Grants Atk+4 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a lance.

name: Lance Power 3
description: Grants Atk+6 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a lance.

name: Lance Power 4
description: Grants Atk+8 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a lance.

name: Lance Power 5
description: Grants Atk+10 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a lance.

name: Let Fly
description: Use to perform a guaranteed-hit, area-of-effect attack at the start of the next player phase. Unit loses equipped weapon.

name: Level Boost
description: When unit defeats a foe of a higher level, grants Lvl+1 until the end of battle.

name: Lifesphere
description: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, restores 20 HP and heals status effects.

name: Lifesphere+
description: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, restores 30 HP and heals status effects.

name: Lifesphere++
description: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, restores 40 HP and heals status effects.

name: Lightsphere
description: If unit initiates combat, halves chance of receiving critical hit from foe.

name: Lineage
description: Increases unit's earned experience by 20%.

name: Lodestar Rush
description: Use to launch 7 consecutive sword attacks at 30% damage. Adjacent foe only.

name: Lost & Found
description: If unit finishes an action or waits next to an ally, may find an item and increase support with that ally.

name: Luck +10
description: Grants Lck+10.

name: Luck +12
description: Grants Lck+12.

name: Luck +2
description: Grants Lck+2.

name: Luck +4
description: Grants Lck+4.

name: Luck +6
description: Grants Lck+6.

name: Luck +8
description: Grants Lck+8.

name: Luna
description: While making an attack, may ignore half of foe's Def/Res. Trigger %=Dex.

name: Lunar Brace
description: If unit initiates combat with a physical attack, deals extra damage=20% of foe’s Def.

name: Lunar Brace+
description: If unit initiates combat with a physical attack, deals extra damage=30% of foe’s Def.

name: Mag +10
description: Grants Mag+1 and Dex+1.

name: Mag +12
description: Grants Mag+2 and Dex+2.

name: Mag +15
description: Grants Mag+3 and Dex+3.

name: Mag +20
description: Grants Mag+4 and Dex+4.

name: Mag +25
description: Grants Mag+5 and Dex+5.

name: Mag Res 1
description: Grants Mag+1 and Res+1.

name: Mag Res 2
description: Grants Mag+2 and Res+2.

name: Mag Res 3
description: Grants Mag+3 and Res+3.

name: Mag Res 4
description: Grants Mag+4 and Res+4.

description: Grants Mag+5 and Res+5.

name: Magic 2
description: Grants Mag+2

name: Magic 3
description: Grants Mag+3

name: Magic 4
description: Grants Mag+4

name: Magic 5
description: Grants Mag+5

name: Magic Guard 1
description: If foe is equipped with a tome, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

name: Magic Guard 2
description: If foe is equipped with a tome, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

name: Magic Guard 3
description: If foe is equipped with a tome, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

name: Magic Guard 4
description: If foe is equipped with a tome, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

name: Magic Guard 5
description: If foe is equipped with a tome, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

name: Make a Killing
description: May obtain 500G when unit defeats a foe. Trigger %=Lck.

name: Meditation
description: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, grants Res+2 for 1 turn.

name: Mentorship
description: Grants 1.2× EXP modifier to unit and adjacent allies.

name: Merciless
description: Unit deals +50% damage against broken foes.

name: Momentum
description: Grants Atk+1 to first attack during combat for each space unit moved before attacking. (Max +10)

name: Momentum+
description: Grants Atk+1 to first attack during combat for each space unit moved before attacking.

name: Moved to Tears
description: When an ally joins a chain attack in this unit's combat, unit deals +2 damage.

name: Night and Day
description: Use to switch Emblems and swap between Lunar Brace/Gentility and Solar Brace/Bravery for all allies.

name: No Distractions
description: Grants Crit+10 during combat with a foe that can't counter.

name: Not Quite
description: If foe initiates combat, inflicts Hit-10 on that foe during combat.

name: Other Half
description: If unit initiates combat, Robin chain attacks. Grants Mag+10 while engaged.

name: Override
description: Use to attack and move through a line of adjacent foes. Sword/lance only.

name: Pair Up
description: Prevents damage from foes' chain attacks against unit.

name: Party Animal
description: Grants a bonus to Hit and Avo equal to 3× the number of allies and foes within 2 spaces.

name: Pass
description: Foes do not block this unit's movement.

name: Perceptive
description: If the unit initiates combat, grants Avo+15 during combat. Avo increases with high Spd.

name: Perceptive+
description: If the unit initiates combat, grants Avo+30 during combat. Avo increases with high Spd.

name: Piercing Glare
description: Use when HP is full to consume 20% of max HP and prevent foes from entering the 4 spaces diagonally adjacent to unit for 1 turn.

name: Pincer Attack
description: If unit initiates combat while an ally is on the opposite side of the foe, always follow up (if weapon allows).

name: Pivot
description: Use to move to the opposite side of an adjacent ally.

name: Protective
description: If foe initiates combat against Nil/Rafal, grants Crit+10 to unit for 1 turn.

name: Quadruple Hit
description: Use to attack once each with sword, lance, axe, and bow.

name: Quality Time
description: After unit acts or waits, restores 5 HP to adjacent allies and slightly increases support with them.

name: Quality Time+
description: After unit acts or waits, restores 10 HP to adjacent allies and slightly increases support with them.

name: Quick Riposte
description: If unit's HP is 80% or more and foe initiates combat, unit will always follow up (if weapon allows).

name: Quick Riposte+
description: If unit's HP is 60% or more and foe initiates combat, unit will always follow up (if weapon allows).

name: Racket of Solm
description: Inflicts Crit-5 on foes within 3 spaces.

name: Rally Spectrum
description: Use to grant adjacent allies +3 to all seven basic stats for 1 turn.

name: Rally Spectrum+
description: Use to grant allies within 2 spaces +3 to all seven basic stats for 1 turn.

name: Reforge
description: If unit's HP is 11 or more and an adjacent ally is broken after combat, sacrifices 10 HP and removes the break status from that ally.

name: Reposition
description: Use to move an adjacent ally to the opposite side of unit.

name: Reprisal
description: If unit's HP is not full, adds 30% of lost HP to Atk.

name: Reprisal+
description: If unit's HP is not full, adds 50% of lost HP to Atk.

name: Resistance 2
description: Grants Res+2.

name: Resistance 3
description: Grants Res+3.

name: Resistance 4
description: Grants Res+4.

name: Resistance 5
description: Grants Res+5.

name: Resolve
description: If unit's HP is 75% or less after combat, grants Def/Res+5 as long as unit's HP stays below 75%.

name: Resolve+
description: If unit’s HP is 75% or less after combat, grants Def/Res+7 as long as unit’s HP stays below 75%.

name: Resonance
description: When equipped with a tome, if unit's HP is 2 or more, unit loses 1 HP at start of combat and deals +2 damage during combat.

name: Resonance+
description: When equipped with a tome, if unit’s HP is 2 or more, unit loses 1 HP at start of combat and deals +3 damage during combat.

name: Rise Above
description: Grants Lvl+5.

name: Rivalry
description: When an ally within 2 spaces defeats a foe, grants Crit+10 to unit for 1 turn.

name: Run Through
description: Use to attack an adjacent foe, then move to the space opposite that foe.

name: Sacred Twins
description: While engaged with Eirika, changes Lunar Brace to Eclipse Brace and Gentility to Blue Skies for all allies.

name: Sandstorm
description: While making a physical attack, may calculate damage with 150% of Def instead of Str. Trigger %=Dex.

name: Seconds
description: On eating a packed lunch, unit may obtain another of the same item. Trigger %=Lck.

name: Self-Healing
description: Unit can target itself with healing staves.

name: Self-Improver
description: If unit uses Wait without attacking or using items, grants Str+2 for 1 turn.

name: Share Spoils
description: If there is an ally within 1 space, grants Hit/Avo+10 at a cost of Crit-10 to unit.

name: Silence Ward
description: Grants immunity to silence.

name: Single-Minded
description: During combat with a foe who was also unit's most recent opponent, grants Hit+20.

name: Smash
description: When making a smash attack, push the target 2 spaces instead of 1.

name: Soar
description: Grants Mov+2. Unit can cross terrain as if flying.

name: Sol
description: Unit may recover HP=50% damage dealt. Trigger %=Dex.

name: Solar Brace
description: If unit initiates combat, unit recovers HP=30% of damage dealt.

name: Solar Brace+
description: If unit initiates combat, unit recovers HP=50% of damage dealt.

name: Soulblade
description: When attacking with a sword, damage is calculated using average of foe's Def and Res.

name: Soul Conversion
description: Grants +20 SP for each defeated foe. Triggers even without a ring or bracelet equipped.

name: Spd/Dex +1
description: Grants Spd+1 and Dex+1.

name: Spd/Dex +2
description: Grants Spd+2 and Dex+2.

name: Spd/Dex +3
description: Grants Spd+3 and Dex+3.

name: Spd/Dex +4
description: Grants Spd+4 and Dex+4.

name: Spd/Dex +5
description: Grants Spd+5 and Dex+5.

name: Spd/Res +1
description: Grants Spd+1 and Res+1.

name: Spd/Res +2
description: Grants Spd+2 and Res+2.

name: Spd/Res +3
description: Grants Spd+3 and Res+3.

name: Spd/Res +4
description: Grants Spd+4 and Res+4.

name: Spd/Res +5
description: Grants Spd+5 and Res+5.

name: Special Dance
description: If unit uses Dance, grants Dex/Spd/Lck+3 to target for 1 turn.

name: Special Guard 1
description: If foe is equipped with a special attack, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

name: Special Guard 2
description: If foe is equipped with a special attack, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

name: Special Guard 3
description: If foe is equipped with a special attack, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

name: Special Guard 4
description: If foe is equipped with a special attack, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

name: Special Guard 5
description: If foe is equipped with a special attack, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

name: Speed 1
description: Grants Spd+1.

name: Speed 2
description: Grants Spd+2.

name: Speed 3
description: Grants Spd+3.

name: Speed 4
description: Grants Spd+4.

name: Speed 5
description: Grants Spd+5.

name: Speedtaker
description: Grants a stacking Spd+2 each time unit initiates combat and defeats a foe. Bonus lasts for the rest of the battle.

name: Spell Harmony
description: If unit initiates combat with a tome, grants Atk equal to the number of adjacent allies with tomes.

name: Staff Mastery 1
description: Grants Hit+10 when using a staff. Staves also heal an additional 3 HP.

name: Staff Mastery 2
description: Grants Hit+15 when using a staff. Staves also heal an additional 5 HP.

name: Staff Mastery 3
description: Grants Hit+20 when using a staff. Staves also heal an additional 7 HP.

name: Staff Mastery 4
description: Grants Hit+25 when using a staff. Staves also heal an additional 10 HP.

name: Staff Mastery 5
description: Grants Hit+30 when using a staff. Staves also heal an additional 15 HP.

name: Starsphere
description: Grants unit enhanced stat growth when leveling up.

name: Storm's Eye
description:
Grants immunity to break. Foe cannot follow up. Unit follows up. Lasts 1 turn. Sword/axe only.
[Dragon] Prevent one critical hit.
[Backup] Crit+20.
[Covert] Avo+30.

name: Storm's Eye+
description:
Grants immunity to break. Foe cannot follow up. Unit counters before foe’s first attack and follows up. Lasts 1 turn. Sword/axe only.
[Dragon] Prevent one critical hit.
[Backup] Crit+20.
[Covert] Avo+30.

name: Str/Def +1
description: Grants Str+1 and Def+1.

name: Str/Def +2
description: Grants Str+2 and Def+2.

name: Str/Def +3
description: Grants Str+3 and Def+3.

name: Str/Def +4
description: Grants Str+4 and Def+4.

name: Str/Def +5
description: Grants Str+5 and Def+5.

name: Str/Dex +1
description: Grants Str+1 and Dex+1.

name: Str/Dex +2
description: Grants Str+2 and Dex+2.

name: Str/Dex +3
description: Grants Str+3 and Dex+3.

name: Str/Dex +4
description: Grants Str+4 and Dex+4.

name: Str/Dex +5
description: Grants Str+5 and Dex+5.

name: Strength 1
description: Grants Str+1.

name: Strength 2
description: Grants Str+2.

name: Strength 3
description: Grants Str+3.

name: Strength 4
description: Grants Str+4.

name: Strength 5
description: Grants Str+5.

name: Strength 6
description: Grants Str+6.

name: Stunning Smile
description: If foe is male, inflicts Avo-20 on that foe during combat.

name: Surprise Attack
description: If unit initiates combat from terrain that provides an Avo bonus, foe cannot counterattack.

name: Survival Plan
description: When there are more foes than allies within 3 spaces, grants Avo+20.

name: Swap
description: Use to switch places with an adjacent ally.

name: Sword Agility 1
description: Grants Avo+10 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Agility 2
description: Grants Avo+15 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Agility 3
description: Grants Avo+20 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Agility 4
description: Grants Avo+25 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Agility 5
description: Grants Avo+30 at a cost of Crit-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Focus 1
description: Grants Hit+10 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Focus 2
description: Grants Hit+15 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Focus 3
description: Grants Hit+20 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Focus 4
description: Grants Hit+25 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Focus 5
description: Grants Hit+30 at a cost of Ddg-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Guard 1
description: If foe is equipped with a sword, unit takes 1 less damage during combat.

name: Sword Guard 2
description: If foe is equipped with a sword, unit takes 2 less damage during combat.

name: Sword Guard 3
description: If foe is equipped with a sword, unit takes 3 less damage during combat.

name: Sword Guard 4
description: If foe is equipped with a sword, unit takes 4 less damage during combat.

name: Sword Guard 5
description: If foe is equipped with a sword, unit takes 5 less damage during combat.

name: Sword Power 1
description: Grants Atk+2 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Power 2
description: Grants Atk+4 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Power 3
description: Grants Atk+6 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Power 4
description: Grants Atk+8 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a sword.

name: Sword Power 5
description: Grants Atk+10 at a cost of Avo-10 when using a sword.

name: Divine Blessing
description:
Use to grant 1 ally a Revival Stone.
[Dragon] Restore 20 HP to ally.
[Qi Adept] Heal their status effects.

name: Divine Blessing+
description:
Use to grant 1 ally a Revival Stone. If ally is not synced, fully restore HP. If ally is synced, +3 to engage meter. If ally is engaged, restore engage turns.
[Dragon] Restore 20 HP to ally.
[Qi Adept] Heal their status effects.

name: Tome Precision 1
description: Grants Hit/Avo+3 when using a tome.

name: Tome Precision 2
description: Grants Hit/Avo+5 when using a tome.

name: Tome Precision 3
description: Grants Hit/Avo+7 when using a tome.

name: Tome Precision 4
description: Grants Hit/Avo+10 when using a tome.

name: Tome Precision 5
description: Grants Hit/Avo+15 when using a tome.

name: Torrential Roar
description: Use to attack 3 spaces in a line, turning those spaces into water terrain.

name: Trained to Kill
description: While unit occupies terrain that provides an Avo bonus, grants Crit+15.

name: Twin Strike
description: Use to make a sword attack followed by a lance attack from Ephraim on adjacent foe. Effective: Corrupted.

name: Unyielding
description: At start of player phase, if HP is 20% or less, restores 20% of unit's max HP.

name: Unyielding+
description: At start of player phase, if HP is 30% or less, restores 30% of unit's max HP.

name: Unyielding++
description: At start of player phase, if HP is 40% or less, restores 40% of unit's max HP.

name: Vantage
description: If unit's HP is 25% or less and foe initiates combat, unit can counter before foe's first attack.

name: Vantage+
description: If unit's HP is 50% or less and foe initiates combat, unit can counter before foe's first attack.

name: Vantage++
description: If unit's HP is 75% or less and foe initiates combat, unit can counter before foe's first attack.

name: Verdant Faith
description: If unit is adjacent to the Divine Dragon, grants Hit+10 during combat to both of them.

name: Warp
description: Use to warp up to 10 spaces and make a powerful magic attack.

name: Weapon Insight
description: If unit is equipped with a weapon of lower level than foe's, grants Crit+20 during combat.

name: Weapon Sync
description: If unit initiates combat using same weapon type as the synced Emblem, grants Atk+5. If engaged, grants Atk+5 regardless of weapon type.

name: Weapon Sync+
description: If unit initiates combat using same weapon type as the synced Emblem, grants Atk+7. If engaged, grants Atk+7 regardless of weapon type.

name: Will to Win
description: If unit's HP is 50% or less at start of combat, grants Hit/Avo+20 during combat.

name: World Tree
description: When unit uses a staff, may not consume a use. Trigger %=Dex.

name: Wrath
description: At start of combat, for each HP the unit has lost, grants Crit+1 during combat. (Max +30)
